dashboardPageLoadTimeError:
Page: Dashboard 
Error Message: Dashboard page must be laod within two seconds and must show posts list
Locator: .post--content
createPostPopupError:
Page: Dashboard 
Error Message: Post Something, text area must be visible and clickable
Locator: .textarea
enterPostTextError:
Page: Dashboard 
Error Message: User must be able to write text in text area on create post popup
Locator: .custom_textarea_container
postPublishError:
Page: Dashboard 
Error Message: Post publish button must be clickable and must publish the post
Locator: button[type='button']
